comments.raw_text:
With the patch from bug 663893 applied, I can get a reproducible content process abort on desktop Fennec on mac.

STR:
1. connect to irc.mibbit.com/#mibbit
2. /whois someone
3. close the whois box

Created attachment 538972
Stack trace

With the patch from bug 663893 applied, I can get a reproducible content process abort on desktop Fennec on mac.

STR:
1. connect to irc.mibbit.com/#mibbit
2. /whois someone
3. close the whois box
